title: Enrollment 2026
question: When is enrollment for 2026?
answer: The enrollment period for School Year 2026 starts on February 26, 2026.

title: Entrance Exam 2026
question: When is the entrance exam for 2026?
answer: The entrance examination for incoming students will be held from January 15â€“30, 2026. Details will be posted on the SSU official website.

title: Admission Requirements
question: What are the admission requirements?
answer: Applicants must submit Form 138, birth certificate, certificate of good moral character, and 2x2 ID photo.

title: Courses Offered
question: What courses are offered at SorSU?
answer: Sorsogon State University offers programs in IT, Education, Engineering, Business, Agriculture, and more. Course availability may vary by campus.

title: Transfer Students
question: Can I transfer to Sorsogon State University?
answer: Yes. Transferees must submit a transfer credential, transcript of records, and meet program-specific requirements.

title: Shiftee Policy
question: Can I shift to another program?
answer: Yes. Students may shift by submitting a written request and securing approval from both program chairs.

title: Foreign Students
question: Does SorSU accept foreign students?
answer: Yes. Foreign applicants must comply with CHED and DFA requirements and provide authenticated academic records.
